data.actual_result: Discord displays the payment issue but the issue sounds like I bought a game (see the 14 days/2hours policy thing), but I don't.
data.expected_result: Discord displays the payment issue description related to Nitro (or not showing it at all).
data.short_description: Discord shows refund information for Nitro purchase
data.steps_to_repro: - Buy Nitro (within last 14 days) - Open User Setting > Billing - Expand the latest history (when you buy that Nitro thing) - observe the payment issue description
